thought: To craft crimson_fence_gate, I need to craft crimson_planks, which requires 1 crimson_stem. I have one crimson_stem in my inventory at slot 33, so I will move it into slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
